questions.question: In what animals can we find a stomach as part of their digestive system?
What are the two main components secreted by the stomach to aid digestion?
What type of contractions does the stomach use to aid digestion?
Where is the stomach located in most vertebrates?
What term describes the partially digested food leaving the stomach?
Besides vertebrates, what other types of animals have a stomach?
What is the name of the process that precedes digestion in the stomach?
What part of the digestive system comes *before* the stomach?
What is the primary function of the stomach?
What happens to food after it has been processed by the stomach?
